mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_board(ADMIN_BOARD_SEQ, ADMIN_BOARD_ID, ADMIN_BOARD_TITLE, ADMIN_BOARD_CONTENT, ADMIN_BOARD_DATE, ADMIN_BOARD_CNT, ADMIN_BOARD_STATIC) VALUES(nextval('BOARD_SEQ'), 'admin', #{adminBoardTitle}, #{amdinBoardContent}, now(), 0, false)
